alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with locally heavy rain will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northern Bennington and northwestern Windham Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shaftsbury to near Arlington to West Wardsboro. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...These storms are producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Londonderry, Salem, Manchester, Stratton, Shaftsbury, Dorset, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Windham, Porter, Jamaica, Sunderland, Wardsboro, Rupert, Sandgate, Peru, Glastenbury, Wardsboro Center and Beartown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
